title: Where can I watch live cricket matches? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cricket is more like a family sport in our country, people tend to spend a lot of time together watching and playing cricket together. But, amid the lockdown and with the changing time families are no more seen playing or watching cricket together. But we have the live streaming apps, binding the families yet again with cricket matches. Live streaming apps live telecast the matches simultaneously when they are being held. These live matches can be easily viewed on the live streaming apps available online. These live streaming sports apps caters us with everything just in seconds. Sports Tiger, a live sports streaming app live streams cricket matches as well as other sports. They cater us with a wide range of exclusive videos and sports news and keeps us updated. They have recently live streamed the Pakistan Super League (PSL) and Indian Virtual League (IVL). It is definitely one of the best live streaming platform for watching live cricket.

Alright guys many of you might be wondering how to watch Live cricket matches from outside or inside India? There are a couple of ways: You can always try the paid subscriptions. If in India you can sign up with a cable. The second step is you using apps such as Sony Liv and Hotstar. (Sony LIV is for India and hotstar is for India,UK,USA.)I personally don’t understand and like the concept of paying for stuff for like this. But there are a couple of ways for my Android peeps, you can use apps such as LIVE NET TV and SWIFT STREAMFor my iPhone users, you can install one app called as LIVE CRICKET TV via App Store.To conclude I have used both phones and I can assure you these two will completely work fine and for free.
